<dt class="note">Unknown
<dd class="note">In ArmA 2 - This command no longer works. The map is now an inventory item. It is kept under the weapon class name "itemmap".<br>
Example: <code>unitname removeweapon "itemmap"</code> To add again use <code>unitname addweapon "itemmap"</code>.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
